title: BlockParty
body:
Welcome to our neighborhood. Seeing as its Hallowe'en, it would only be appropriate for you to go trick-or-treating. Bring back a candy from each house and we can really party.
[[ Yeah sure fine, I'll go find candy.| YesWant]] 
[[ I'm literally just trying to find the party.| NoWant]]

title: YesWant
body: Wow you take orders real easy--Thanks!

title: NoWant
body: Tough Tits sugar plum, I'm the teacher now. Go find some candy.
